meanings.sent1: The sun will brighten the room in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She used a lamp to brighten the dark corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The smiley face sticker will brighten up your notebook.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude can brighten even the gloomiest days.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers brighten the garden with their beauty.

meanings.definition: To become more cheerful or lively
meanings.sent1: Her face brightened when she saw her favorite dessert.
meanings.sent2: The children's laughter brightened the atmosphere of the party.
meanings.sent3: Listening to music always brightens my mood.
meanings.sent4: A good joke can brighten a dull conversation.
meanings.sent5: The surprise gift brightened his day unexpectedly.
